title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 141.1 - Application for approval to accept the services of volunteer workers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 141.1 - Application for approval to accept the services of volunteer workers

State Regulations

The application for approval by the Director of the Budget
shall include the reasons why the use of volunteer workers is necessary, what
will be accomplished by using volunteer workers and an estimate of the number
of volunteer workers required. Notes

R. & Regs. Tit. 9

141.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
